eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.service

Class SimSearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.service.SimSearchController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/simsearch/api")
public class SimSearchController
extends Object
    Controller that handles all HTTP requests to the RESTful web service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimSearchController

        @Autowired
public SimSearchController()
        Constructor. It also instantiates the lists of API keys.

    • Method Detail

      • getApiKeys

        private List<String> getApiKeys(String propKeys)
        Provides the list of API keys defined by the administrator upon launching of the service.
        Parameters:
        propKeys - A string containing comma-separated values representing admin-defined API keys.
        Returns:
        A list of API keys as defined by the administrator when the service is launched.

      • isAdminApiKey

        private boolean isAdminApiKey(String api_key)
        Checks whether the given API key is defined by the administrator, i.e., using a JSON when the service is launched.
        Parameters:
        api_key - The API key to check.
        Returns:
        A Boolean value: True, if the key is defined by the administrator; otherwise, False.

      • isValidApiKey

        private boolean isValidApiKey(String api_key)
        Checks whether the given API key is valid, i.e., listed among those generated for the various data sources.
        Parameters:
        api_key - The API key to check.
        Returns:
        A Boolean value: True, if the key is valid; otherwise, False.

      • getMasterApiKey

        private String getMasterApiKey(String api_key)
        Checks whether the given API key is associated with a master API key and thus allows certain requests (search, catalog) against the respective datasets.
        Parameters:
        api_key - The API key to check.
        Returns:
        The master API key to employ for evaluating any requests.

      • assignExtraApiKey

        private boolean assignExtraApiKey(String masterApiKey,
                                  String extraApiKey)
        Associates the given extra API key to an existing master API key that enables certain requests (catalog, search).
        Parameters:
        masterApiKey - The master API key that enables SimSearch requests.
        extraApiKey - The extra API key to associate with the master API key.
        Returns:
        A boolean value: True, if the extra API key has been associated with the master API key; otherwise, False.

      • revokeExtraApiKey

        private boolean revokeExtraApiKey(String masterApiKey,
                                  String extraApiKey)
        Revokes and deactivates the given extra API key from an existing master API key; specifying requests with the extra API key will be no longer enabled.
        Parameters:
        masterApiKey - The master API key that controls SimSearch requests.
        extraApiKey - The extra API key to revoke from the master API key.
        Returns:
        A boolean value: True, if the extra API key has been revoked; otherwise, False.

      • generateAPIkey

        public String generateAPIkey()
        Generates a new API key that is associated with the newly specified data source(s).
        Returns:
        A string with the new API key.

      • settings

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/_settings",
                method={POST,GET},
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.json.simple.JSONObject> settings(@RequestHeader(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        String apiKey)
        Provides general information about the running SimSearch service accessible through this API key.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The client API key controlling the corresponding data sources.
        Returns:
        The main settings of the running instance.

      • assignKey

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/assignKey",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> assignKey(@RequestHeader(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 String apiKey,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 String extraKey)
        Associates an API key with a master API key, thus enabling certain requests (catalog, search).
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The client API key controlling the corresponding data sources.
        extraKey - The extra API key to associate.
        Returns:
        A notification to the user.

      • revokeKey

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/revokeKey",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> revokeKey(@RequestHeader(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 String apiKey,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 String extraKey)
        Removes an API key that has been associated with a master API key, which controls similarity search requests.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The client API key controlling the corresponding data sources.
        extraKey - The extra API key to revoke.
        Returns:
        A notification to the user.

      • listKeys

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/listKeys",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> listKeys(@RequestHeader(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               String apiKey)
        Lists any API keys associated with a master API key that controls similarity search requests.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The client API key controlling the corresponding data sources.
        Returns:
        A JSON listing the catalog of queryable attributes and the similarity operation supported by each one.

      • index

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/index",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> index(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         MountRequest params)
        Mounts the specified data sources and associates them to a new API key, including building in-memory indices or instantiating connections to remote sources.
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters specified in JSON (instantiating a MountRequest object) that specify the data sources that will be enabled and their queryable attributes.
        Returns:
        A notification whether the data sources were successfully mounted or not. If successful, this request also returns an API key to be used in all subsequent requests involving these data sources.

      • append

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/append",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> append(@RequestHeader(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           String apiKey,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           MountRequest params)
        Appends the specified data sources to those already mounted for this API key, including building in-memory indices or instantiating connections to remote sources.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The client API key associated with the corresponding data sources.
        params - Parameters specified in JSON (instantiating a MountRequest object) that specify the data sources that will be enabled and their queryable attributes.
        Returns:
        A notification whether the data sources were successfully mounted or not.

      • unmount

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/unmount",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> unmount(@RequestHeader(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String apiKey)
        Unmounts all data sources associated with the given API key, and destroys the corresponding instance of SimSearch.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The client API key associated with a running instance of SimSearch service.
        Returns:
        A notification about the status of the SimSearch instance.

      • catalog

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/catalog",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AttributeInfo[]> catalog(@RequestHeader(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    String apiKey,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    CatalogRequest params)
        Lists the queryable attributes that may be included in similarity search requests.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The client API key associated with the corresponding data sources.
        params - Parameters specified in JSON (instantiating a CatalogRequest object); if empty {}, then all sources will be listed.
        Returns:
        A JSON listing the catalog of queryable attributes and the similarity operation supported by each one.

      • delete

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/delete",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> delete(@RequestHeader(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           String apiKey,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           RemoveRequest params)
        Removes attribute(s) from those available for similarity search queries. Any removed attribute(s) can become available again with an index request to the RESTful service.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The client API key associated with the corresponding data sources.
        params - Parameters specified in JSON (instantiating a RemoveRequest object) that declare the attribute(s) to become unavailable for queries.
        Returns:
        A notification on whether the requested attribute removal succeeded or not.

      • search

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/search",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SearchResponse[]> search(@RequestHeader(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   String apiKey,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   SearchRequest params)
        Allows submission of multi-attribute similarity search requests to the RESTful service.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The client API key associated with the corresponding data sources.
        params - Parameters specified in JSON (instantiating a SearchRequest object) that define the attributes, query values, and weights to be applied in the search request.
        Returns:
        A JSON with the ranked results qualifying to the criteria specified in the similarity search query.
